RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEXAS DANA set the pace drawing out to upper stretch adding on there as much the best. QUITCHERSNIVELIN a step slow early came five wide in upper stretch rallying late four deep to save place. FREEDOM'S ALLURE saved ground to upper stretch extending in a place duel along the inside. SPUNKY ZOEY chased the pace vying between horses down the lane staying on to the end. BAY OF ANGELS unruly was steadied at the start, angled inside to upper stretch showing late interest from the rail. MAYSVILLE MISS slow early played no factor. RHYTHM FOREVER sent hard pursuit all out to upper stretch wearing out there. CONNECT IT was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off to lane, added on, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom's Allure
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, extended near rail lane, battled late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Spunky Zoey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, vied between horses lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 4 wide lane, late move for place

ENTRY.NAME: Maysville Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythm Forever
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pursued to upper stretch, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: Bay of Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly steadied break, rail lane, vied late

ENTRY.NAME: Connect It
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HE'S THE SOUPERWON away alertly set the pace being hooked and headed on the turn dueling inside of rival down the lane getting up gamely. UNCLE CARLITO stumbled at the break hurrying to the front drawing even abreast on the turn dueling down the stretch being out gamed at the end. PRETTY STORMY chased the pace racing four wide down the lane holding off the others. KREWE CHIEF slow early raced five wide on the turn then near mid track down the lane failing to menace. QUESTION AUTHORITY raced evenly off the pace fading to upper stretch. ROYAL SQUEEZE trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Squeeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, held off others

ENTRY.NAME: He's the Souperwon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked on turn, dueled inside lane gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Question Authority
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Krewe Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide turn, mid track lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Carlito
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled break, rushed to front, drew even turn, abreast lane,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE was in close nearing the sixteenth clearing after. SOMERSET BAY broke sharply pressing inside saving place. DELAYED ENGAGEMENT rallied in the final yards. QUAD EIGHTS gained late three deep. PERFECT GENTLEMAN pressed inside checking near the sixteenth pole. SKYLAS GOLD trailed throughout. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF PERFECT GENTLEMAN AGAINST THE RIDER OF REJUVENATE FOR INTERFERENCE NEAR THE SIXTEENTH POLE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Somerset Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Gentleman
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, crowded checked near the sixteenth pole

ENTRY.NAME: Skylas Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Rejuvenate
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close nearing the 1/16 pole, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Delayed Engagement
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied in final yards

ENTRY.NAME: Quad Eights
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained late three deep

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 26, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD IDEA stalked the pace rallying to lead on the far turn clearing along the inside in upper stretch holding up late. HELLUVA LIFE slow early circled out leaving the far turn emerging seven wide in upper stretch gaining in the closing yards. EMPEROR'S GOLD rallied on the far turn extending in upper stretch finishing evenly near mid track. GAGE HAS A GRAY slow early moved up on the far turn racing evenly down the lane to best the others. TOMMY TUESDAY hustled along chased to the far turn fading there. COLAVITO sent hard chased the pace for three quarters then folded in upper stretch. BOB'S CALLING was always outrun. SMOOTH PAPA sent clear set the early pace wilting on the far turn easing to the wire. BOLD PROPHET hustled along pressed on the backside then folded abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out far turn, bid 7 wide lane, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Gage Has a Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained far turn, evenly lane to best others

ENTRY.NAME: Emperor's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on far turn, extended lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Bob's Calling
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Prophet
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed backside, used up far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, wrested lead far turn, cleared inside, held up

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Papa
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, wilted far turn, eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Tuesday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased to far turn, faded there

ENTRY.NAME: Colavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, chased to the 1/4 pole, wilted lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GORMLEYESQUE away alertly set the pace widening in upper stretch angling out mid stretch holding rival at bay late. LADRO DI FICHI emerged to threaten on the turn looming on the outside down the lane pressing to the wire. HOV LANE chased early then dropped off on the turn regrouping from the rail down the lane closing late. FIRST IMPRESSION tracked the pace racing three path down the lane finishing well. WICKED LUNA a step slow through the turn proved no menace. TAP N GLO slow early was never involved. BRODY'S JESSICA played no factor. DARK HONEY chased through the turn tiring in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Luna
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Hov Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early dropped off turn, closed well inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Ladro Di Fichi
ENTRY.COMMENT: emerged turn, loomed outside lane, pressed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Gormleyesque
ENTRY.OWNER: Burnett Brett Kilgore Shannon and Nicks William A
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened top alne, angled out, held

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, three path lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's Jessica
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Tap N Glo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 88. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAME IT ON EDDIE advanced on the backside wresting a clear to the quarter pole opening a comfortable margin in upper stretch being ridden out. PEACE OF EKATI raced evenly saving ground to upper stretch surging late along the rail to save place. LAUTREC slow early came four wide into upper stretch rallying late three deep. HARD ASTRAY sent clear set the pace being passed on the far turn chasing in upper stretch weakening late between horses. SMASH tracked the pace racing evenly to upper stretch weakening late in the three path. BACK ALLEY CAT dropped back early playing no factor. HPNOTIQ RHYTHM was never involved. FEELING IT was always outrun. ISTILLGOTIT hustled early gave steady retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside to lane, late surge for place

ENTRY.NAME: Hpnotiq Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, bid clear far turn, opened lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, passed far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Smash
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, evenly to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling It
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 4 wide into lane, came on late three deep

ENTRY.NAME: Istillgotit
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave steady retreat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOZY'S WILDCAT sent clear set the pace widening on the turn digging in down the lane being hooked late from the outside holding on at the wire. FAT DADDY rallied on the turn bidding four wide down the lane surging late abreast rival just missing. TWO GUNS slow early cut the corner to upper stretch vying willingly along the rail late. LATIN SPICE chased the pace losing ground to the leader on the turn racing evenly on the inside through the lane. MONTAUK DADDY raced mid pack weakening in upper stretch. WOODLAND WALK chased early then faded on the turn. DARK OAK raced evenly through the turn tiring in upper stretch. DRIVE BY LAYOVER hustled along through the turn would wilt in upper stretch. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Fat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 'rallied on the turn, bid 4 wide lsne, surged abreast late missed

ENTRY.NAME: Latin Spice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, no headway to lane, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Drive by Layover
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy's Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, widened on turn, dug in lane, just held,

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Two Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, gained on the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHNNY U stalked the pace to upper stretch looming on the outside surging past in the final yards. AW ITE pressed the pace through the turn edging clear along the inside in upper stretch being run down in the final yards. MAS CHIKILIN a step slow through the turn raced four wide down the lane finishing evenly. I'M A LAWMAN pressed the pace through the turn weakening between horses late. GRAB THE MUNNY faded on the turn. BALISTICO in close early dropped back being outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Balistico
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close early, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Chikilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 4 wide lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny U
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed upper stretch, surged clear last yards

ENTRY.NAME: Aw Ite
ENTRY.OWNER: Inman Betty Tunstall Shirley and Tunstall James
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, edged clear to lane, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Lawman
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened between lane
